trans-unit.source: The SearchResult class encapsulates a node in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy that is returned during a search through <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: SearchResult 類別封裝期間，搜尋會傳回 Active Directory 網域服務階層架構中的節點<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Instances of the SearchResult class are very similar to instances of <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> class.
trans-unit.target: SearchResult 類別的執行個體是非常類似於執行個體的<xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>類別。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: The crucial difference is that the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> class retrieves its information from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy each time a new object is accessed, whereas the data for SearchResult is already available in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>, where it gets returned from a query that is performed with the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> class.
trans-unit.target: 重要的差異在於<xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>類別擷取 Active Directory 網域服務階層每次存取新的物件，而 SearchResult 的資料則是的<xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>，其中它取得的查詢所傳回的利用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>類別</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher></xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>中已提供的資訊</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: Only those properties that are specified through the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection in your query will be available from SearchResult.
trans-unit.target: 只有在透過所指定的屬性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>可從 SearchResult 會在查詢中的集合。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> that corresponds to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 擷取<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>對應於<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref>從 Active Directory 網域服務階層。

trans-unit.source: Use GetDirectoryEntry when you want to look at the live entry instead of the entry that was returned through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>, or when you want to invoke a method on the object that was returned.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要查看即時的項目，而不是透過傳回的項目使用 GetDirectoryEntry <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>，或當您想要叫用方法所傳回的物件。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Calling GetDirectoryEntry on each <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult> returned through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> can be slow.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 呼叫 GetDirectoryEntry 每<xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>透過傳回<xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>可能會很慢。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>

trans-unit.source: The Path property uniquely identifies this entry in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: [路徑] 屬性會唯一識別在 Active Directory 網域服務階層架構中的這個項目。

trans-unit.source: The entry can always be retrieved using this path.
trans-unit.target: 項目一律可以使用這個路徑來擷取。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection"></xref> collection of properties for this object.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection"></xref>屬性，這個物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: This collection only contains properties that were explicitly requested through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 此集合只包含透過<xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>明確要求的屬性

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection"></xref> of properties set on this object.
